fees.description: Total sum of fees forged by delegate

rewards.description: Total sum of rewards made by delegate

delegates.description: Array of next forgers public keys
List of delegates account voted for.

broadhash.description: Broadhash is established as an aggregated rolling hash of the past five blocks present in the database

epoch.description: Time when blockchain epoch starts. Value `2017-09-02T17:00:00.000Z` is for mainnet.

fee.description: Current fee value for `type 0` (token transfer) transactions. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

nethash.description: The `nethash` describes e.g. the Mainnet or the Testnet, that the node is connecting to.

milestone.description: Current slot height, which determines reward a delegate will get for forging a block.

reward.description: The reward a delegate will get for forging a block. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000). Depends on the slot height.

supply.description: Total current supply of ADM tokens in the network. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000). Total supply increases with every new forged block.

PublicKey.description: 256 bit public key of ADAMANT address in hex format

amount.description: Amount to transfer, 8 decimal points (100000000 equals to 1 ADM). For non-transfer transactions must be `0`

type.description: Type of chat message (1 - Basic Encrypted Message, 2 - Rich Content Message, 3 - Signal Message). See details https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Message-Types

rate.description: Current position in the Delegates List

rank.description: Current position in the Delegates List

approval.description: Share of votes of all votes in the system

productivity.description: Productivity / Uptime of a delegate. If `0`, delegate is not active now

voters_cnt.description: Number of accounts who voted for delegate

register_timestamp.description: Epoch timestamp of when delegate was registered

username.description: Voter's delegate username. `null` if address is not a delegate.

balance.description: ADM balance of voter's ADAMANT wallet. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000)

items.description: Delegate public key. Leave as is for Upvote or prefix the public key with minus sign (`-`) for Downvote

recipientId.description: ADAMANT address of account who votes. Same as `senderId`

senderId.description: ADAMANT address of account who votes. Same as `recipientId`

receivedAt.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format

port.description: Port number of ADAMANT node. `36666` for mainnet or `36667` for testnet

state.description: State of the peer. Available values: Connected (2), Disconnected, Banned

broadhash.description: Broadhash on the peer node. Broadhash is established as an aggregated rolling hash of the past five blocks present in the database.

updated.description: Unix timestamp based in ms, when peer updated

nonce.description: Unique Identifier for the peer. Random string.

delegate.description: Registration of a new delegate, type 2

old_chat_message.description: Sending a message (not used for now)

broadhash.description: Broadhash is established as an aggregated rolling hash of the past five blocks present in the database

epoch.description: Time when blockchain epoch starts. Value `2017-09-02T17:00:00.000Z` is for mainnet.

milestone.description: Current slot height, which determines reward a delegate will get for forging a block.

nethash.description: The `nethash` describes e.g. the Mainnet or the Testnet, that the node is connecting to.

reward.description: The reward a delegate will get for forging a block. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

supply.description: Total current supply of ADM tokens in the network. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

type.description: Should be always equal to `9` (Store in KVS transaction type)
Can be `type 0  Token transfer` or `type 8  Chat/Message`.

tags.name: Account

tags.description: List of endpoints intended to work with chats and chatrooms in ADAMANT blockchain

get.description: Get account information by ADAMANT address or by Public Key

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How much blocks to get, integer. Default is `100`.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Height offset value for results. Default is `0`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How much blocks to get, integer. Default is `100`.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Height offset value for results. Default is `0`.

parameters.name: generatorPublicKey
parameters.description: Delegate's public key of ADAMANT address who generated the block

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Get block of specific node's height

get.description: Returns list of transactions with `type = 8` (deprecated, use `/chatrooms` instead)

parameters.name: fromHeight
parameters.description: Filter transactions starting from specified block `height`

get.description: Retrieves list of registered ADAMANT delegates

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of delegates to retrieve, integer. Default is `101` (active delegates).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Height offset value for results. Default is `0`.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Partial or full username of a delegate

get.description: Get forging activity of a delegate
Current votes of specific ADAMANT account
Get list of connected peer nodes

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of nodes. Default is `100`.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Height offset value for results. Default is `0`.

get.description: Returns information of node's loading process
Returns information of the node sync process with other peers
Broadhash is established as an aggregated rolling hash of the past five blocks present in the database.
Returns time when blockchain epoch starts. Value `2017-09-02T17:00:00.000Z` is for mainnet.
Returns current fee value for `type 0` (token transfer) transactions. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).
Returns current fee values for different transaction types
The nethash describes e.g. the Mainnet or the Testnet, that the node is connecting to.
Return current slot height, which determines reward a delegate will get for forging a block.
Returns reward  the reward a delegate will get for forging a block. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000). Depends on the slot height.
Returns total current supply of ADM tokens in network. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000). Total supply increases with every new forged block.
Returns blockchain network information in a single request
Returns both ADAMANT blockchain network information and Node information in a single request.
Fetch data from KVS. As a result you'll get a list of transactions of `type = 9` with KVS data, stored in `asset.state` field.

schema.description: Array of keys, comma-separated in string format
Array of ADAMANT addresses, comma-separated in string format

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of transactions in the result

post.description: Broadcast transactions of `type 0  Token transfer` or `type 8  Chat/Message`. See [Transaction Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Transaction-Types)
